title: Project: Mean Reversion Bot
content:
## Buying the Dip

Mean reversion assumes extreme price moves will snap back to the average.

### RSI Strategy

- **RSI (Relative Strength Index)**: Oscillates between 0 and 100.
- **Oversold (<30)**: Buy.
- **Overbought (>70)**: Sell.

### Bollinger Bands Squeeze

Buy when price touches the lower band (2 std devs below mean). Sell when it touches the upper band.
